content: Notes from our Monday lunch and Wed evenings session: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cVSxI3cUHDiuAMgRiXJZtXUlWiqbLcmRz_-AyehhCDE
Isn't this conversation meant to take place in https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/196008-ig-publishing.20requirements/?

for printable IGs, i was trying to experiment with jekyll themes. some themes are printer-friendly.
i know that it is possible to put paging into css, but haven't gone there.
@Lloyd McKenzie can i put this above as a comment in the google doc? or you can filter it and put it there
@Rien Wertheim This isn't really defining requirements for IGs as a whole, but more about what we're going to do with the IG Publisher. That said, I'll post it there too.
@Jose Costa Teixeira Comment away. I don't think we're going to do anything about printability in the first release
